Title: How Social Media Is Fueling Gen Z’s Sex Recession
Description:
For her new book, journalist Carter Sherman interviewed over 100 young people about why they’re not having sex.
She says they’re “very horny” but also more isolated, self-conscious, and fearful.

Title: Vivo does it again — the X Fold 5 is the best foldable I used in 2025
Description:
With the X Fold 5, Vivo is showing that it can deliver a foldable that's among the best around.
And the best part is that it doesn't cost anywhere as much as Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7.

Title: The Galaxy Watch 8 Pissed Me Off, but I'd Still Recommend It
Description:

Title: Do you want federal money for an EV or home solar? Time is running out — fast
Description:
Federal tax credits for rooftop solar, heat pumps and other energy-efficient technologies are going away at the end of the year.

Title: 10 years ago, a flood devastated this Texas town. The road to recovery has been long
Description:
Wimberley, Texas, was the site of a devastating flash flood on Memorial Day weekend in 2015.
Now, 10 years later, the town has rebuilt with such floods in mind — but still feels the emotional effects.

Title: A CEO explains how he cut his battery chain's reliance on China and plans to offset the latest tariffs
Description: Batteries Plus CEO Scott Williams said the chain has reduced its reliance on Chinese suppliers for car batteries in order to minimize tariff costs.

Title: Wall Street's status symbol of the summer: the elite golf shirt
Description:

Title: Exclusive: German startup takes on ‘solar-only’ rivals with energy-as-a-service model

Title: This cargo ship is turning its CO2 emissions into green cement
Description:
A giant cargo ship is trapping carbon from its exhaust and turning it into cement for use in onshore construction.
